trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Поддерживает действие триггера, который возобновляет приостановленную <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
A ResumeStoryboard object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: Объект ResumeStoryboard может возобновлять только <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>приостановлена и не оказывает влияния на <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>в любом другом состоянии.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы иметь возможность приостанавливать, возобновлять или управление <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>интерактивно, устанавливать <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>свойство его <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>и использовать <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>объекта (такие как <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, или <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) управлять им с помощью ссылки на его <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: Если <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>из <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>не указан, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>не может управлять в интерактивном режиме после ее запуска.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе [как: использование триггеров событий для управления раскадровкой после ее запуска](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref> class.
